TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MenuItemStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style
Public NotInheritable Class MenuItemStyle Inherits Style
public ref class MenuItemStyle sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style

summary.span: Represents the style of a menu item in a control.

span.span: Represents the style of a menu item in a control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來代表中功能表項目的樣式控制項。Use the class to represent the style of a menu item in the control. 功能表項目會顯示在靜態功能表，或是動態功能表。A menu item is displayed in either a static menu or a dynamic menu. 一律會以顯示靜態功能表控制項，而只有當使用者將滑鼠指標在父功能表項目包含動態子功能表時，動態功能表的顯示。A static menu is always displayed in a control, whereas a dynamic menu is displayed only when the user positions the mouse pointer over a parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 您可以指定不同的樣式特性 （例如 字型和色彩） 的每個不同的功能表項目類型。You can specify different style characteristics (such as font size and color) for each of the different menu item types. 下表列出可用的功能表項目樣式。The following table lists the available menu item styles. |功能表項目樣式屬性Menu item style property|描述Description| |------------------------------|-----------------| ||當滑鼠指標位於動態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||個別的動態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for an individual dynamic menu item.| ||針對動態功能表樣式設定。The style settings for a dynamic menu.| ||目前已選取動態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for the currently selected dynamic menu item.| ||當滑鼠指標位於靜態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||個別靜態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for an individual static menu item.| ||針對靜態功能表樣式設定。The style settings for a static menu.| ||目前選取的靜態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for the currently selected static menu item.| 當多個樣式屬性會設定靜態功能表項目時，樣式屬性會套用順序如下：When multiple style properties are set for a static menu item, the style properties are applied in the following order: 1. .. 2. .. 如果集合或定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. .. 如果定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. .. 同樣地，動態功能表項目之樣式屬性會套用順序如下：Likewise, the style properties for a dynamic menu item are applied in the following order: 1. .. 2. .. 如果集合或定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. .. 如果定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. .. 類別會繼承其成員的大部分類別。The class inherits most of its members from the class. 它會擴充類別提供控制的功能表項目文字周圍的空間，以及相鄰的功能表項目之間的間距數量的屬性。It extends the class by providing properties that control the amount of space around a menu item's text, as well as the space between adjacent menu items. 使用屬性以控制左側和右側的功能表項目的文字。Use the property to control the amount of space to the left and right of the menu item's text. 同樣地，屬性會控制和功能表項目的文字底下的上述的空間量。Similarly, the property controls the amount of space above and below the menu item's text. 您可以控制之間的間距數量的功能表項目，物件套用至和其相鄰的功能表項目藉由設定屬性。You can control the amount of spacing between the menu item that the object is applied to and its adjacent menu items by setting the property. 如需樣式繼承的設定的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on the inherited style settings, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何控制中的功能表項目外觀控制項的樣式屬性來設定從傳回的物件， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to control the appearance of the menu items in a control by setting the style properties of the object returned from the , , , and properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyle/CS/menuitemstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyle/VB/menuitemstylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Copies the style properties of the specified object into the current instance of the class.

span.span: Copies the style properties of the specified object into the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用複製指定的樣式屬性的方法物件存放至呼叫這個方法的物件。Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified object in the object that calls this method. > [!CAUTION] > 目前的執行個體中的所有屬性類別將會取代中指定的對應屬性物件。All properties in the current instance of the class will be replaced by the corresponding properties in the specified object. 若要複製樣式屬性，而不會取代任何設定值，請使用方法。To copy style properties without replacing any set values, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來複製另一個樣式設定物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the style settings of another object. summary.span: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of the menu item's text.

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of the menu item's text.

value.span: 數量的距離 （以像素為單位），左側和右側功能表項目的文字。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) to the left and right of the menu item's text.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制要的功能表項目文字周圍的水平空間數量物件套用。Use the property to control the amount of horizontal space around the text of the menu item to which the object is applied. 此空間會插入文字的左邊的緣之間的文字區域中，框線和文字的右邊緣和文字的框線之間。This space is inserted between the left edge of the text and the border of the text area, and between the right edge of the text and the text's border. 若要控制的垂直間距，請使用屬性。To control the vertical spacing, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用填補的功能表項目文字周圍的水平間距 10 個像素的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to pad the horizontal spacing around the text of a menu item by 10 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding/CS/menuitemstylehorizontalpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding/VB/menuitemstylehorizontalpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the amount of vertical spacing between the menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items.

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of vertical spacing between the menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items.

value.span: （以像素為單位） 的功能表項目之間的垂直間距量物件套用及其相鄰的功能表項目。

span.span: The amount of vertical spacing (in pixels) between the menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制要功能表項目之間的垂直間距量套用物件和其相鄰的功能表項目相同層級。Use the property to control the amount of vertical spacing between a menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items at the same level. 目前的功能表項目的上邊緣和一個功能表項目，以及目前的功能表項目的下邊緣和下一個功能表項目上的邊緣之間的下邊緣之間插入此空格。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the current menu item and the lower edge of the previous menu item, as well as between the lower edge of the current menu item and upper edge of the next menu item. > [!NOTE] > 中的第一個功能表項目不會呈現上方空間控制項。The upper space is not rendered for the first menu item in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來分隔功能表項目從其相鄰的功能表項目 5 像素為單位的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to separate a menu item from its adjacent menu items by 5 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleItemSpacing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleItemSpacing/CS/menuitemstyleitemspacingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleItemSpacing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleItemSpacing/VB/menuitemstyleitemspacingvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The to combine settings with.

summary.span: Combines the style properties of the specified object with those of the current instance of the class.

span.span: Combines the style properties of the specified object with those of the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將指定的樣式屬性合併物件的樣式屬性從呼叫這個方法的物件。Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the object that this method is called from. > [!CAUTION] > 這個方法以設定每個屬性未設定在目前的聯結的樣式屬性物件及其對應的值，指定與物件。This method joins the style properties by setting each property that is not set in the current object with its corresponding value in the specified object. 尚未設定的屬性將會更新。Only properties that have not been set will be updated. 如果指定的屬性物件未設定，在目前的對應屬性物件不會變更。If a property in the specified object is not set, the corresponding property in the current object does not change. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，將合併目前的執行個體的樣式設定與另一個類別物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the style settings of the current instance of the class with another object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleMergeWith/CS/menuitemstylemergewithcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleMergeWith/VB/menuitemstylemergewithvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space above and below a menu item's text.

The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制要的功能表項目文字周圍的垂直空間數量物件套用。Use the property to control the amount of vertical space around the text of the menu item to which the object is applied. 此空間會插入文字的上邊緣之間的文字區域，以及文字的下邊緣和文字的框線之間的框線。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the lower edge of the text and the text's border. 若要控制水平間距，請使用屬性。To control the horizontal spacing, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用10 個像素填補的功能表項目文字周圍的垂直間距的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to pad the vertical spacing around the text of a menu item by 10 pixels.
